head.title: Mary Ellen Strawbridge, Francis Partel Jr.

identified-content.person: STRAWBRIDGE, MARY ELLEN BURKE (MARY ELLEN BURKE PARTEL)

hedline.hl1: Mary Ellen Strawbridge, Francis Partel Jr.

block.p: Mary Ellen Burke Strawbridge and Francis Joseph Partel Jr. were married yesterday at the Episcopal Church of the Redeemer in Bryn Mawr, Pa. The Rev. Ann W. Stevenson officiated.

Mrs. Partel, 60, is the president of the Female Association of Philadelphia, a charitable organization. She graduated from Garland Junior College. She is a daughter of the late Emily Schweizer Herrmann and Charles C. Burke Jr.
Mary Ellen Burke Strawbridge and Francis Joseph Partel Jr. were married yesterday at the Episcopal Church of the Redeemer in Bryn Mawr, Pa. The Rev. Ann W. Stevenson officiated.

Mrs. Partel, 60, is the president of the Female Association of Philadelphia, a charitable organization. She graduated from Garland Junior College. She is a daughter of the late Emily Schweizer Herrmann and Charles C. Burke Jr.

Mr. Partel, 58, is an in-house management consultant at U.S. Bancorp in Minneapolis and a former senior executive of the American Express Company and the Chase Manhattan Bank. He received a bachelor's degree and an M.B.A. from Columbia University. He is a son of Mrs. Frank J. Partel of Harbor Court, S.C., and the late Mr. Partel.
The bridegroom's previous marriage ended in divorce, as did the bride's.
